attributes.action: provide EQUAL rights accross the UK to health care, education and medication
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is simply not fair that those in Wales get free prescriptions and those in Scotland get free elderly care and free university education at the expense of the rest of the UK population. This is not an anti Wales or Scotland petition or a demand for free services, simply a call for EQUAL treatment for all regardless of their location within the UK.
